snippet.title: 10 Things to Look for When Buying a Laptop: 8: Size and Weight
snippet.description: When buying a laptop, you should use certain criteria to make sure you get the best value. See these 10 things to look for when buying a laptop... There are a couple ways to get around the weight issue. You can always shop for a brand like Sony's Vaio, which makes weight a priority concern. The downside: Vaios...
